hero.title: Transform Your Resume with AI Alchemy
hero.subtitle: Turn your ordinary resume into the perfect match for your dream job using our AI-powered optimization technology.

cta.title: Start with 3 Free Uses
cta.subtitle: Try our AI-powered resume optimization with no commitment.

questions.question: How many free uses do I get?
questions.answer: New users receive 3 free uses to try our service.

questions.question: What file formats are supported?
questions.answer: Currently, we support PDF format for resume uploads.

questions.question: How long does the process take?
questions.answer: The optimization process typically takes 2-3 minutes.

features.title: The new way to build resumes
features.subtitle: We understand the challenges of creating a resume that stands out. That's why we built Resume Alchemist, the AI-powered resume builder that helps you craft a resume that gets you hired.

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered
aiPowered.description: Our AI analyzes your experience and skills to craft a resume that highlights your strengths.

atsOptimized.title: ATS Optimized
atsOptimized.description: We ensure your resume is optimized for applicant tracking systems (ATS) to increase your chances of getting an interview.

jobSpecific.title: Job-Specific
jobSpecific.description: We tailor your resume to specific job postings, highlighting the skills and experience that match the job description.

easyToUse.title: Easy to Use
easyToUse.description: Our intuitive interface makes it easy to create a professional resume in minutes.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to create a resume that gets you hired.

upload.title: Upload Your Resume
upload.description: Upload your existing resume in PDF format.

enterJob.title: Enter Job Posting URL
enterJob.description: Paste the URL of the job posting you're applying for.

getOptimized.title: Get Your Optimized Resume
getOptimized.description: Our AI will analyze your resume and the job posting to create a tailored resume that highlights your skills and experience.

companies.title: Optimize Your Resume for Top Companies

testimonials.title: What people are saying
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it. See what others are saying about Resume Alchemist.
